catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 476
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: woodblock printed book with illustrations by the monk Tokusen; blue cover with plaid title label; text pages along with blocky, grotesque images of demons torturing humans, in many various, creative ways; male figures with beards and scribes; bodhisattvas on clouds and in temple complex at end
markings: Japanese inscription in red, inside cover; in pencil, URC inside cover: [339 / no. 6A]; back page, ULC, in pencil: [dated / 1594]; Ex Libris label from John Hadmar Sticht bottom center inside front cover
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
title: Sutra on the Ten Kings of Hell
